description.value: This suite includes the proper equipment necessary for a crew member to take remote control of another ship from the safety of their own ship. A number of crew members can be deployed at a time in remote ships from this suite equal to one quarter of the ship's suite capacity by size, as shown in the @JournalEntry[Mnvw9iBw8gxgfCXw]{Starship Size Suite Capacity} table. The distance at which this suite can connect to remote ships is limited by the communications of the ship this suite is installed in.
